gurmukhi: ਦੇਵ ਦੈਤ ਦਿਸਾ ਵਿਸਾ; ਜਿਹ ਕੀਨ ਸਰਬ ਪਸਾਰ ॥
transliteration: Dev Dait Disaa Veesaa Jihkeen Sarab Pasaar||
translation: He, who has created gods, demons, directions and the whole expanse,

gurmukhi: ਕੳੁਨ ੳੁਪਮਾ ਤੌਨ ਕੋ; ਮੁਖ ਲੇਤ ਨਾਮੁ ਮੁਰਾਰ ॥੩॥੭॥
transliteration: Kaoun Oupmaa Taoun Ko Moukh Let Naam(u) Muraar||3||1||
translation: On what analogy should he be called MURAR?3.
RAGA BILAWAL OF THE TENTH KING
How can He be said to come in human form?

gurmukhi: ਸਿੱਧ ਸਮਾਧ ਸਾਧ ਕਰ ਹਾਰੇ; ਕÎੋ ਹੂੰ ਨ ਦੇਖਨ ਪਾੲੇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾੳੁ ॥
transliteration: Siddh Samaadh Saadh Kar Hdare Kyauhoon Na Dekhan Paae||1|| Rahaao||
translation: The Siddha (adept) in deep meditation became tired of the discipline on not seeing Him in any way…..Pause.

gurmukhi: ਨਾਰਦ ਬਿਅਾਸ ਪਰਾਸਰ ਧ੍ਰ¨ਅ ਸੇ ਧਿਅਾਵਤ; ਧਿਅਾਨ ਲਗਾੲੇ ॥
transliteration: Naarad Biaas Paraasar Dhrooaa Se Dhyaavat Dhyaan Lagade||
translation: Narad, Vyas, Prashar, Dhru, all meditated on Him,

gurmukhi: ਬੇਦ ਪੁਰਾਨ ਹਾਰ ਹਠ ਛਾਡਿਓ; ਤਦਪਿ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਨ ਅਾੲੇ ॥੧॥
transliteration: Bed Puraan Haar Hath Chhaadio Tadap(i) Dhyaan Na Aae||1||
translation: The Vedas and Puranas, became tired and forsook insistence, since He could not be visualized.1.

gurmukhi: ਦਾਨਵ ਦੇਵ ਪਿਸਾਚ ਪ੍ਰੇਤ ਤੇ; ਨੇਤਹ ਨੇਤ ਕਹਾੲੇ ॥
transliteration: Daanav Dev Pisaach Pret Te Natah(i) Net(i) Kahaae||
translation: By demons, gods, ghosts, spirits, He was called indescribable,

gurmukhi: ਸੂਛਮ ਤੇ ਸੂਛਮ ਕਰ ਚੀਨੇ; ਬ੍ਰਿਧਨ ਬ੍ਰਿਧ ਬਤਾੲੇ ॥੨॥
transliteration: Soochham Te Soochham Kar Cheene Briddhan Briddh Bataae||2||
translation: He was considered the finest of the fine and the biggest of the big.2.

gurmukhi: ਭੂਮ ਅਕਾਸ ਪਤਾਲ ਸਭੈ ਸਜਿ; ੲੇਕ ਅਨੇਕ ਸਦਾੲੇ ॥
transliteration: Bhoom Akaadh Pataal Sabhau Saj(i) Ek Anek Sadaae||
translation: He, the One, Created the earth, heaven and the nether-world and was called “Many”;

gurmukhi: ਸੋ ਨਰ ਕਾਲ ਫਾਸ ਤੇ ਬਾਚੇ; ਜੋ ਹਰਿ ਸਰਣ ਸਿਧਾੲੇ ॥੩॥੮॥
transliteration: So Nar Kaal Phaas Te Baache Jo Har(i) Sharan Sidhaae||3||1||
translation: That man is saved from the noose of death, who takes refuge in the Lord.3.
RAGA DEVGANDHARI OF THE THENTH KING

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕ ਬਿਨ; ਦੂਸਰ ਸੋ ਨ ਚਿਨਾਰ ॥
transliteration: Ik Bin Doosar So Na Chinaar||
translation: Do not recognize anyone except ONE;

gurmukhi: ਭੰਜਨ ਗੜ੍ਹਨ ਸਮਰਥ ਸਦਾ ਪ੍ਰਭ; ਜਾਨਤ ਹੈ ਕਰਤਾਰ ॥ ਰਹਾੳੁ ॥
transliteration: Bhanjan Gadhan Samrath Sadaa Prabh Jaanat Hai Kartaar||1|| Rahaao||
translation: He is always the Destroyer, the Creator and the Almighty; he the Creator is Omniscient…..Pause.
